definitions.definition: To take a temporary rest, take a break for a short period after an effort.
To interrupt an activity and wait.
definitions.example: When telling the scary story, he paused for effect.

definitions.definition: To hesitate; to hold back; to delay.
To halt the play or playback of, temporarily, so that it can be resumed from the same point.
definitions.example: to pause a song, a video, or a computer game
